{{Wireless embedded system |brand=ASUS |model=RT-AC53 |revision=A |upc= |ean= |asin=B01L1V1GJK;US;,B01L1V1GJK;DE; |newegg=9SIA4UG5789071 |price= |est_release_date= |fcc_date=08/07/2016 |manuf_country=China |is_manuf=No |manuf=SGE |manuf_model= |manuf_rev= |availability=now |type=wireless router |fcc_id=MSQ-RTDV00 |pwr_v=12 |pwr_amp=1 |pwr_conn=barrel |cpu1_brand=MediaTek |cpu1_model=MT7620A |cpu1_cspeed=580 |fla1=8 |fla1_brand=GigaDevice |fla1_model=GD25Q64CSIG |ram1=64 |ram1_brand=Winbond |ram1_model=W9751G6KB-25 |expansion_if_types= |expansion_usb_num= |jtag= |serial=yes,, 4-pin header,, |wi1_chip1_brand=MediaTek |wi1_chip1_model=MT7620A |wi1_802dot11_protocols=bgn |wi1_ant_conn= |wi1_txchains=2 |wi1_rxchains=2 |wi1_sstreams=2 |wi2_chip1_brand=MediaTek |wi2_chip1_model=MT7610EN |wi2_802dot11_protocols=an+ac |wi2_ant_conn=U.FL |wi2_txchains=1 |wi2_rxchains=1 |wi2_sstreams=1 |eth_none= |eth_cpu=true |sw_cpu= |sw_brand=Realtek |sw_model=RTL8367RB |lan_speed=1G |lan_ports=2 |wan_speed=1G |wan_ports=1 |addl_chips= |flags=AiCloud support |stock_boot=U-Boot; |stock_os=Linux;2.6.36; |tp_firmware=Padavan ? |802dot11_protocols=abgn+ac |default_ssid=ASUS_XX_2G, ASUS_XX_5G |default_ssid_regex= |default_ip=192.168.1.1 |default_user=admin |default_pass=admin |oui=2C:56:DC |oui_eth=2C:56:DC }} :Concurrent dual-band, '''2T2R''' (''300''Mbps [11n] max.) @2.4GHz - '''N300''' :'''1T1R''' (''433''Mbps [11ac] / ''150''Mbps [11n] max.) @5GHz - '''AC433''' = '''AC750 class''' ---- {{TagLine|AC750 Wireless Dual Band Gigabit Router}} :{{ProductPage|http://www.asus.com/us/Networking/RT-AC53/}}{{SupportPage|vendor=ASUS|region=us|model=RT-AC53}} "RT-AC53 REV1.0", "H19804PN679A1" and "1619" is silkscreened on the board. *Model Num: 90IG02Z1-BM3000 {{see also|ASUS RT-AC51U}} ===Overview=== *'''High-speed performance''': Concurrent speed up to a combined 750Mbps data rate *'''Smart control with ASUSWRT''': With the ASUSWRT dashboard UI, setup, monitor, :and control network applications all in one intuitive area *'''Robust external antenna''': 3 external strong antenna enhances signal transmission *'''Gigabit Ethernet''': Data transfer 10 times faster than 10/100 Fast Ethernet devices *'''High Power Design''': In pursuit of ultimate capability ===Specifications=== * Product Segment: AC750 performance (300+433 Mbps) * Memory: 8MB Flash, 64MB RAM * Operating Frequency: 2T2R 2.4GHz / 1T1R 5GHz * Guest Network: 3x 2.4GHz, 3x 5GHz * Antenna: 3x External antenna * Ports: 1x WAN GbE (RJ45), 2x LAN GbE (RJ45) * Operation mode: Wireless Router, Range Extender, Access Point * Dimensions (W x D x H): [[Dimensions::320 mm x 190 mm x 35 mm]] * Weight: [[Weight::285 g]] ===Reviews=== *[http://www.foxnetwork.ru/index.php/36-reviews/reviews/219-asus-rt-ac53 ''Asus RT-AC53'' on '''FoxNetwork'''] (RU) (internal images) *[http://www.modlabs.net/blogs/asus-rt-ac53-and-asus-rp-ac68u ''Asus RT-AC53 & RT-AC68U'' on '''ModLabs'''] (RU) *[https://3dnews.ru/946019 ''Asus RT-AC53 rewiew'' on '''3D|News'''] (RU) :Chipsets: [[MediaTek]] [http://www.mediatek.com/products/homeNetworking/mt7620n-a MT7620A] (2T2R 802.11bgn WiSoC) :WLAN: [[MediaTek]] MT7620A, [http://www.mediatek.com/products/broadbandWifi/mt7610e MT7610E] (1T1R 802.11an/ac) :Switch: [[Realtek]] [http://www.realtek.com.tw/products/productsView.aspx?Langid=1&PFid=15&Level=5&Conn=4&ProdID=300 RTL8367RB] GbE (1x WAN, 2x LAN) ===Forum threads=== *[http://wl500g.info/showthread.php?33775-Asus-RT-AC85U-RT-AC58U-RT-AC53-and-RT-AC1200GU ''Asus RT-AC85U, RT-AC58U, RT-AC53 and RT-AC1200GU'' on '''wl500g.info'''] :[[ASUS RT-AC53]] (Wireless-AC750) - FW 3.0.0.4.380.6038 (2016/09/26) :[[MediaTek]] MT7620A/MT7610E (ePA/eLNA), RAM 64MB, Flash 8MB, GbE 
#############################################################
# MTK platform, linux-2.6.36.x
# Valild option for BOOT_FLASH_TYPE are shown below:
#	NOR, SPI, NAND
# Valild option for DRAM are shown below:
#	8M, 16M, 32M, 64M, 128M, 256M
# Valid option for SECOND_IF are shown below:
# 	NONE, MT7610
# 	RT3092, RT5392, RT5592, RT3593, RT3572, RT5572 (TBD) 
##############################################################
 
export RT-AC53 := IPV6SUPP=y HTTPS=y MIPS32=r2 RALINK=y MT7620=y 
EBTABLES=y PARENTAL2=y ACCEL_PPTPD=y AUTODICT=y SHP=y RTAC53=y 
SFP=y ODMPID=y LED_ALL=y NEW_RGDM=y RA_SKU=y RA_SKU_IN_DRV=y 
DEBUGFS=y LAN50=y REBOOT_SCHEDULE=y OPENVPN=y VPNC=y REPEATER=y 
TCODE=y MDNS=y FINDASUS=y BTN_WPS_ALLLED=y SSH=y NEWSSID_REV2=y 
ATCOVER=y GETREALIP=y REDIRECT_DNAME=y BUILD_NAME="RT-AC53" \
	BOOT_FLASH_TYPE=SPI SPI_FAST_CLOCK=y \
	DRAM=64M \
	SECOND_IF=MT7610E EDCCA=y RALINK_DFS=y \
	EXTRA_KERNEL_CONFIGS="MT7620_BAUDRATE=115200 RT2880_DRAM_64M=y 
        EXTERNAL_PA_EXTERNAL_LNA=y RT2860V2_AP_RTMP_INTERNAL_TX_ALC=n
        UBOOT_CMDLINE=y SWITCH_CHIP_RTL8367RB=y SWITCH_CTRLIF_MDIO=y 
        RAETH_HAS_PORT5=y P5_RGMII_TO_MAC_MODE=y MODEL_RTAC53=y"
===See also=== {{ASUS AC products}} __NOTOC__
